mapper.select: SELECT bno,title,content,writer,date_format(regdate,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS REGDATE FROM mp_board order by bno desc

select * from ( select bno, title,content, writer, regdate from mp_board order by bno desc) as T1
limit #{skip},#{amount}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mp_board(title, content, writer) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, #{writer})
mapper.update: UPDATE mp_board SET TITLE=#{title}, CONTENT=#{content}, updateDate = NOW() WHERE bno = #{bno}
